news.message: We've added several small improvements based on your feedback: better haptic feedback when placing markers, improved tile animations, and smoother transitions between levels. The game should feel more polished overall!

news.title: Did you know?
news.message: The initial version of Gravesweeper was designed, developed, and released in under two weeks by one person? If you also want to be inspired and motivated, find a local community like the one in St. Louis. Check out stlgamedev.com for information about the St. Louis Game Development community!
